sndlib.ext.generators.gml
Class ProblemGmlGenerator

java.lang.Object
  sndlib.ext.generators.gml.ProblemGmlGenerator

public class ProblemGmlGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

This class generates a GML document for a given Problem.

Author:
Roman Klaehne
See Also:
ProblemGmlProperties, SNDlibGmlProperties, SNDlibGmlGenerator

getDefaultInstance

public static ProblemGmlGenerator getDefaultInstance()
Returns the default problem GML generator, initialized with the default properties as returned by ProblemGmlProperties.getDefaults().

Returns:
the default problem GML generator

getInstance

public static ProblemGmlGenerator getInstance(SNDlibGmlProperties gmlProps)
Creates a new problem GML generator, initialized with the specified properties.

This method is equivalent to getInstance(gmlProps.getProblemGmlProperties())

Parameters:
gmlProps - the GML properties to be used when generating GML documents
Returns:
the problem GML generator using the specified properties

generateGml

public void generateGml(Problem problem,
                        java.io.OutputStream target)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Creates a GML document for the given problem and writes it to the specified output stream.

Parameters:
problem - the problem
target - the target output stream
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an underlying I/O error occured
